poem.title: Musée de l'Art Brut, Lausanne
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: When I said mum she died and he hit me When he hits me I say mum and she dies He hit me when she die and I say mum. The mushroom key Secretsecretsecretsecretsecret. Bricabrac think I dye the carrot blue I dry the pilchard tin Toilet-seat turret : a tank. Cover every empty inch In zero point one millimetre ink And bless me, doctor.
